name: Far Gone
description:
A LudumDare48 submission.

  

Lost in the middle of a strange place, a young girl has to find a way out. And try to understand what's going on.

   

Controls: WASD: Move Mouse: Look Around Left Mouse Button: Interact

  

Please note that the WebGL version has some audio artefacts. If you can, consider downloading the Windows build.

/!\ For Firefox users: there is a known issue with the camera cursor being dragged down. If you encounter this, try launching the game with another browser.

Team:

Arthur Peralta / Brittany Gomes / Thomas Bardet.
